website_summaries.verdict: A great bargain for a solid, durable ATV cover.
pros: Good stitching and strong, waterproof material
Comes with a strap that passes under the ATV and keeps the cover stable in wind
cons: Some buyers report that the material is a little thin, and the strap that it comes with is not of the best quality

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this cover for any who has a ride on ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this cover for my sons hot wheels car to make space in my house to protect the condition of there car from the outdoor elements when it is not in use and it works perfectly... I would recommend this cover for any who has a ride on toy car for their kids that needs outside instead of in
customer_reviews.author: JaVonn Collier Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ATV Cover
customer_reviews.text: Due to the low price, I was skeptical that this product would be very good. But it is, actually, very high-quality. Even with both front and read rack extenders installed, it completely covers my Polaris 570 Sportsman including the tires. The strap that passes under the ATV is a great addition. I no longer have to use bungee cords to prevent the wind from blowing the cover off the ATV. It is completely exposed to the elements and keeps my ATV perfectly dry. It has held up very well in the Texas sun.
customer_reviews.author: Frisco06

customer_reviews.title: JUNK, lasted less than 6 months!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the end of March 2019. Here it is, the first week of September and it’s completely faded and 2 seams have given way. Material is so deteriorated that it cannot even been sewn. DO NOT BUY!!! JUNK.....!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C.

customer_reviews.title: Good but got it too big
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cover my children's powered mini cars. I got it extra large. Not on purpose. I dont think I understood the dimensions. Never the less, its durable and keeps them both dry since we keep them both outside. I'd recommend it, just make sure you get the proper size. Too big and the wind will blow it up like a parachute and you'll be readjusting it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Jihad the Gawd

customer_reviews.title: is NOT waterproof !
customer_reviews.text: LEAKS water !! and to me missing the major point. Should not be sold as a waterproof cover...Mower was all wet after a rain, now I have to use trash bags underneath...
customer_reviews.author: Vahe

customer_reviews.title: LotFancy Waterproof ATV Cover -- keeps the old Honda 300 FourTrax happy
customer_reviews.text: Honda 300 FourTrax, and old gal but still running great. Chose the SMALL for this ATV, it's a Goldilocks fit that is neither too tight nor too loose and not subject to wind whipping. Skirt enclosed all the way to the ground, elastic cord on the entire bottom perimeter keeps the cover in place. Cover also reaches over the handlebars and the front and back carry racks without problems. Reinforced corners; material seems strong enough for our high mountain winds, but not so heavy that it's like a tarpaulin. I removed the belly strap in favor of long flat bungee straps, much easier and quicker to fit and forget. Easy on the pocket book, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: just being Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good cover but has a strap issue
customer_reviews.text: Overall good, no holes yet but the straps broke not too long after we got it (I’ve been deployed since buying). There is only one buckle and the female end has ripped out from the cover. I’ve tried to secure it down with tape, zip ties, etc and nothing works. We have since just had to wrap the excess material around a tire so that it doesn’t come loose and fly away, which has happened before when my kids don’t secure it down enough. We live in Vegas and are prone to winds, this is most likely the cause along with not strong enough securing to the cover.
customer_reviews.author: R. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good fit/storm safe
customer_reviews.text: I like these covers & they are great for the price. I thought the fabric might be heavier. We will see how they hold up. Make sure you measure your ATV. I got my husband the XL because he was 2" over the large length and has front & rear boxes, bumpers, mirrors Etc. Fits great
customer_reviews.author: North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Tore in about a year under moderate wind and rain conditions
customer_reviews.text: Used it to cover a toy motorized car for the children. Kept in backyard and after about 6-9 months several holes started to develop. The quality and durability of the cover is poor. I can't imagine how it would stand up to rougher conditions with an ATV.
customer_reviews.author: zeroorone

customer_reviews.title: Rugged cover!
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this to cover (and protect) a new DIY outdoor sink and cabinet (wood and granite). Looking forward to using it for many more years. So here it is Spring 2019 and I removed the cover . . . GREAT shape, no damage from the winter to my DIY sink and cabinet. REALLY think this is a well made product. Of course it wasn't abused in any way and in fact was on a covered back porch. As far as I'm concerned it was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Works for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected except there are two pre-punched holes in the cover and with wind the hole pieces will fall out which means if it rains or snows it will get in those spots. Not to mention if snow piles up on top, when it starts to melt it goes through the holes. Strap that goes under helps with high wind cause elastic isn't strong enough to hold cause it's like a parachute when wind gets in it. I think to cover your atv in a barn or garage this would be great to keep the dust off of it. Just not outside in the weather.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: it fits over my kids power wheels 4 wheeler and i have it tucked under the wheels and strapped underneath yet somehow stray cats have managed to get under it and get inside the powerwheels and pee all inside it and all over the cover so when i go anywhere near it i gag from the smell i thought the cover would protect them but obviously not.
customer_reviews.author: mworkma1

customer_reviews.title: The strap is weak
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but the strap broke after 6 months of use. *Update* the company contacted me and sent me a replacement Pronto! That's ridiculous service.
customer_reviews.author: abamadude

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first 2-3 weeks, tried to put it on one day and the buckle had torn off the canvas as soon as I tried to tighten it. Never tightened very tight just tight enough to secure during wind. Also runs big. Save your time and money and do not buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover. Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good cover! I got it to cover my son's huge powerwheel firetruck. Packaging was great. Love the included bag to store the cover till its next use. So far it's been a couple weeks using the cover and it looks as good as new and my son's powerwheel is nice and dry. Also I love the fact it includes a snapping lock to keep the cover from flying away on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. White

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cover! I will purchase again when this finally wears out.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality, seems to be working great for outside storage. After purchasing a number of other covers in the past, I tried this. The others ran small in the large size so I ordered this in XL, turns out it is XL! I wish I had gotten the L instead for my Honda foreman, but this just feels a works like a quality cover so I am sticking with it. I recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Durable cover!
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually really impressed with this cover, especially for the price. It is replacing a different cover I purchased about 1 year ago for my kid's ride on car. This cover is made of a much stronger material and looks like it will hold up better to wind/rain/snow.
customer_reviews.author: Mattfswife

customer_reviews.title: It covers big bore quads with storage boxes.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2019 Suzuki King Quad with a Koplin box on it, this cover works perfectly. The quad is covered and there is a strap to secure the cover. What I don't like is where the Manufacturers placed their label/logo, it should be on the base near an edge, not up on the cover itself because it is stitched in and that's where any tear will start if one does.
customer_reviews.author: Rakkasan 2/187

customer_reviews.title: 1 year an no signs of wear.  Love this durable cover!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover for about a year now and it shows no signs of wearing out. Granted, it's in a pretty shady spot, but it seems to be performing very well. It is very large so it's easy to fit, no matter how it's oriented and the elastic bottom keeps things snug to our 4 wheeler. I've never had a problem with it blowing off and that is without using the buckled strap that is sewn into the cover.
customer_reviews.author: mechengineer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These work great for their intended purpose. They are easy to install and remove. I ordered the large and they fit over our CanAm 450 Outlanders, but just barely. I have to remove the mirrors for the cover to fit properly. I also have rear cases installed, and the Large cover fits over those... it's tight, but they do fit.
customer_reviews.author: aterry

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: so, it's not a heavy duty material as they advertise, which was my first concern when i opened it. all though being light could be an advantage to some, it most likely won't be a problem just don't yank on it while your putting it on. it's defenetly water proof and it does look nice and fit very well. elastic is strong and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be heavy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I received my cover during a week of high winds and rain. I actually used it on a large riding lawnmower but it would easily fit my Honda 680 four wheeler. It came in a storage bag (which I will never use), but a nice touch. I am impressed with the material and workmanship. it has a strap attached to secure to the machine covered. I have another cover that is now 3 years old from another company which is truly lightweight. It has been outside in the sun and weather for 3 years and has begun to come apart. I will be ordering another LofFancy to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my dad to use to cover his Yamaha Fourwheeler that is stored in cold Wisconsin! Not only has my dad bragged about how great of a fit the cover is, he says the material is some of the best quality for a cover he's had. Little does he know that the price of the cover was a bargain as well. We certainly recommend this cover as its a great value, great fit and great material!
customer_reviews.author: amo

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 5/2019, it's now 10/2020. This cover has been on my ATV since purchased. It's kept at the hunting camp, year-around. Under a tin roof, but near the edge where it gets rain from the side, and direct sunlight every AM until about noon. Holding up well, waterproof, protects well. Be careful of the size you order. I wanted L but they were out, so I ordered XL. Works fine, but WAY too big (Yamaha Big Bear 400).
customer_reviews.author: Duane Landry

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to replace worn out ones. They seem well made and heavier than my old ones. I think it stupid for the review starvquestions to ask about durability when there is no way to tell until time passes, but you can't continue the review unless you rate the stars first.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Trailmaster Mid XRX-R Go-kart
customer_reviews.text: The small size will fit a Trailmaster Mid XRX-R Go-kart (without the roll cage) with room to spare -- despite the listed measurements of the cover technically being "too small" for the dimensions of the cart. Clearly there is some wiggle room in the measurements! I just got it, so can't speak to durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.M

customer_reviews.title: securing strap ripped after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: the strap has already ripped after 2 months! so the cover will blow off every time the wind blows!
customer_reviews.author: Bigdrumnc

customer_reviews.title: Needs 1 more strap it's very light weight and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Love the 1 strap but needs 2 Needed 1 more strap for front to back Its definetly water proof They have held up so far with a little more help from another strap due to high winds where I'm at I have to say it's a good buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jay w.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but received wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product 5 days ago, waited patiently because the size I needed was out of stock until a certain date. I received it today, only to realize they sent the wrong size.. the size that has been in stock since I ordered the smallest one available and it was out of stock. I have zero use for this as it is quite big. Seems to be made of decent material but I’m very disappointed that after waiting for the correct size to be in stock that I still received the wrong order.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Burton

customer_reviews.title: Perfects for kid’s Power Wheels vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my kid’s 2 seater Porsche Power Wheels and the StarWars Land cruiser, 1 cover for each. Which are HUGE if you haven’t seen them in person before. Quality looks good and have been holding up to California weather so far
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover, Wish I would have bought the smaller one
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great cover, I have a Rancher 350 and it is plenty big, only reason why i didnt give it 5 stars is that I wished it was a little more specific with sizes and matches to certain models, I went with the Large, should have done size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Rpars

customer_reviews.title: Straps are worthless
customer_reviews.text: The tarp itself is good, but the strap attached is worthless. I purchased 1 to see how we liked it, it covered well and kept the machine dry, so I ordered a second one for the other machine. The first one lasted a few months before the strap ripped off, the second one however didn't last a week. The strap tore off and the tarp was blown away in the wind. I can not recommend this product unless they find a better way to attach the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hunt

customer_reviews.title: FADES FAST
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered one of these covers a few years back and pretty good luck with it. I decided to order the Lot Fancy brand cover again. It fits well on a Yamaha Grizzly 700. The only issue that I finding this time around is that it has faded fast. In less than two months it has gone from dark black to almost a bleached gray. I guess I expected it not to fade this quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chad W.

customer_reviews.title: Vent not that good blow off my gas cap
customer_reviews.text: Dont cover ur 4wheelers all the way to the floor i covered mine and I'm guessing a lot of pressure build-up in my tank because it was like 200 degrees underneath the cover and my gas cap broke off the venting for this cover is no good
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: as I've found that I like that feature
customer_reviews.text: Very tough and works very well for the job, in the sun, covering a 2002 250 Honda recon 4 wheeler. I could have gotten the next size smaller to fit the top a little tighter, but would'nt have been able to drag it down to stretch over the tires, as I've found that I like that feature. Totally pleased with this deal. Been on for probably 6 mos in the Florida sun and it's not fazed a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a quality product. Has heavy duty elastic in bottom corners that fit snuggly over tires at ground level. There is also a belly strap that goes under ATV to keep in place. No issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This will store a LOT
customer_reviews.text: I currently have a 2 seat Jeep Power Wheel, a small toddler ATV, a razor scooter and 2 toddler scooters under this cover and I think I'll put all 3 of our Rody bounce horses in as well. It's an awesome cover and I highly recommend getting one to protect your children's toys during fall and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for our four wheelers- they fit well, stay put (and we can have some major wind), and the bikes haven't gotten wet. Sun has faded them quite a bit, but they remain doing the job!
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ATV cover but caution for windy locations
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice ATV cover for the price. I have purchased 2 of these, 1 for each of our ATVs. Unfortunately, one of them couldn't sustain the 50mph winds and had a strap that already ripped off the cover and then I had to go find it and rig it together differently. Aside from that strap sewing job, the rest of the cover feels durable and has not yet begun to tear or wear excessively.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: So far a good ATV cover for summer & fall.
customer_reviews.text: Not a heavy duty ATV cover, but worked great over the summer. It is still on the machine so I'll know mid winter how well it holds up to minus temps, snow & wind.
customer_reviews.author: History buff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover for our quads.
customer_reviews.text: These covers are the best ones I’ve purchased so far. Not sure on how long they will last, but they look really sharp and go on very easy. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KSA

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and durability, my ATV has been sitting outside all winter and the cover still long oks new. No damage to the cover even after being battered by severe winter winds.
customer_reviews.author: Ski4me

customer_reviews.title: It fades with little use
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it for more than 2 months and the material is almost white. The material has not torn apart, but I don't think it will last long. It's a shame, I had high hopes it would last. At least from the reviews I read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with this!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Yamaha Big Bear 350. It’s a tad big, but it’s fine. Has held up through 3-4 winds storms and heavy rain. For the money, you can’t beat it! Lots of bang for very few bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Used for 4yr olds ride on car and has worked out great
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my 4yr olds Mercedes ride on SUV. We live in LA (NOT extreme weather) and it has been raining periodically in the last couple months. This cover has worked perfectly to keep his car dry.
customer_reviews.author: gjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality atv cover
customer_reviews.text: We have not had our atv cover for long but so far it is superb. It covers the atv all the way down over the tires without a struggle and comes with a stuff bag.
customer_reviews.author: Doris A.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping, great price. Bought 2 of these for my kids 125cc youth quads and should have only bought 1, I cover both quads up with just one,
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit Polaris 450
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it rained approximately 5 minutes after putting the cover on. The water beaded up, looked like it protected my atv from the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: Sizing ;(
customer_reviews.text: The product seems like a great value. EXCEPT it does not fit our 2018 Honda Rancher. Apparently I measured from the wrong part of the bike. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: For being so inexpensive it works very well thus far. The sun has faded it a bit over the summer but its still durable and working as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dewyea

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thin cover and not very well made. I’ve used it now for about 2 months Just as rain protection for my quad, it has not performed well. Seams are unraveling. in summer weather I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: mrt98

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It works great easy to put on and take back off light and keeps my machine cry and protected from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Easy and secure
customer_reviews.text: The cover is small ATV. I only had the cover for about two weeks. The quality looks good...I think I can get few years life. The elastic bands on each corner makes it easy to place on the ATV. Additionally, if has a strap in the middle to secure if you plan to put on a truck or trailer.
customer_reviews.author: JPF

customer_reviews.title: Good quality covers electric toy quad and big Bob stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great quality covers a child electric car and Bob stroller
customer_reviews.author: JnL

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: So far they are holding up to the windy Wyoming weather. Protecting my fourwheelers from snow and sun.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. I have it on my Kodiak 400. It's durable and stands up to the weather. Fits my 4 wheeler like a glove (tires and all).
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Material is thin but seems to be decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly decent design. Fits my 250 Bayou just fine. Also fits my Honda 400 Rancher just fine. The material is a little thin. I expected somewhat thicker, but tjis will do just fine for keep the sun and elements of the bikes. Cheap price, I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Jakobe

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha Big Bear 400
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and has held up over some snow and high winds. Used it on my 2000 Yamaha Big Bear 400
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: i have purchsed other covers before and just by the feel of it you can tell that this is good quality
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: work great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and keeps my quad clean and dry! So far so good! Purchasing another for our other quad.
customer_reviews.author: MMeli24

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. But huge. Better strap it down.. over the months the color fades to gray. But so far no holes or tears. Good to go
customer_reviews.author: Cale

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This product is not waterproof & it wrecked my outdoor table. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: MovieLover23

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2017 Arctic cat Altera TRV 550!
customer_reviews.text: The XL fits my 2017 Arctic cat Altera TRV 550 with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and water proof
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my Yamaha 250 during deer season. Left it on the farm parked in the woods covered during 3 heavy rains, each rain was better than 1 in and this cover kept my wheeler dry. It fits well and hasn't came off during heavy winds. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Keister

customer_reviews.title: Awesome durability and fit
customer_reviews.text: These things fit a very large quad and you can strap underneath so the wind doesn’t blow it off it’s totally awesome. The price is ridiculously minimal for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and function.
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Honda Rancher perfectly and works great when I have to leave it parked outside. Keeps the seat dry in rain and snow. The strap has always kept it on in the Montana wind, which is no small feat. Great fit and price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price and Includes carry bag.
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be perfect, it is a xmas present so we'll know better after xmas
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Heavy weight not flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: Working out great for all the rain here along the Oregon border some frost. Perfect fit nice strap for strong winds too
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Large, quality product
customer_reviews.text: A little too big for a Power Wheels jeep, but very nice product. Still using it. Just tuck it under the tires.
customer_reviews.author: sheltongenie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, fit well over a larger ATV (XL). Perfect for what needed and again, nice quality for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: it a pretty good cover for the price point
customer_reviews.text: So I gave it 5 stars, because for the money, it a pretty good cover for the price point. It completely covers our grizzly yamaha and has not let any water in yet. it is thin and my best guess is it will last about a year in the florida sun.
customer_reviews.author: T.R

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Has been through two storms and hasn’t leaked or broken. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great built-in elastic bands at bottom make a strong and secure fit
customer_reviews.text: Good temporary cover for my Polaris ATV. Material could have been of stronger strength but fits snuggly and great built-in elastic around the bottom to make a secure fit with a cord that snaps together across the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Fuentez

customer_reviews.title: Great ATV Cover
customer_reviews.text: Living in Wyoming where the wind blows constantly I always buy the ATV covers with the strap that runs along the bottom of the ATV. These covers have become increasing harder to find. The strap on this one isn't the best, but it has one that is sufficient. Also, it fits my Kawasaki Prairie 360 like it was made for it.
customer_reviews.author: RSully

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size for the money
customer_reviews.text: Covers my 2019 Sportsman 570, even with a black boar lounger on it.
customer_reviews.author: PupTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover my four wheeler really well and I have a 750
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy w.

customer_reviews.title: It is not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product at all. My son truck was full of water after a night of rain.
customer_reviews.author: Adela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This has really held up well so far this winter. I've had it a few weeks now and have left it out for several storms. It's durable, large, and and seems like it would last in the elements. I only use it when I move my ATV out of the garage (to make room for the cars) during snowstorms.
customer_reviews.author: G. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Useful cover, multi purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my kids EV. Good quality protects from rain.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer_SS

customer_reviews.title: Not real heavy duty but this is normal within the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not real heavy duty but this is normal within the price range. Waterproof so far and stays on in high winds. A bit too big on a Honda 4-Trax without any boxes on racks.
customer_reviews.author: CSB

customer_reviews.title: So far Husband is impressed
customer_reviews.text: fits our 570 Polaris great. Does not cover blade, but did not anticipate it would. We have only had it a few days so cannot say much about durability as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoShop61

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to protect my son's John Deere gator!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the large to be sure it completely protects my son's John Deere gator and it works like a charm! Great value. It has protected in the rain, wind, and storms. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Northmsmom

customer_reviews.title: Good value and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is strong, fits well and keeps my equipment dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: needs more straps
customer_reviews.text: Great cover, but i wish it had more than one clip and strap. It needs a strap in the front and the back to keep the wind from blowing it off. I have woken up a couple times to find it just barely hanging on by the one clip.
customer_reviews.author: PHPpro

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Never really fits well, blows off easily. Who really wants to run a strap under to hold it on, when it has elastic corners?
customer_reviews.author: jfgoodysr

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It rains and snows here. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Not Heavy like they say Just hope it last longer then  the last
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I open told my Grandson's Just like the last not Heavy like they said.
customer_reviews.author: E herrmann

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Its light weight a easy to use. Covers my 700 Kawasaki no problem. Dont know how it will hold up long term.
customer_reviews.author: Jstew

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the dust, rain, sleet and snow off a Polaris ATV. It’s just a bit big for the ATV, but that’s just fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our alternate usage!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. We don't own an ATV, my husband covers his Shriner parade mini Tin Lizzie with it! UPDATE: His buddies liked it so much that I ordered two more for them!
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It was easy to put on my 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rea

customer_reviews.title: Not good with deminsions
customer_reviews.text: Not good with deminsions, it was a little bigger than I expected. Works great, big enough for power wheel vehicle and red wagon, sturdy material and waterproof, loving that this is gonna keep me from eankng water and leaves every use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wells

customer_reviews.title: ATV All Weather Cover
customer_reviews.text: These are made very well and fit great , The small size fits my 1985 Honda 350x ATC & my 1989 Suzuki 230 just right & you can not beat the price $$$
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great winter cover
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for my Polaris Sportsman which I covered throughout the winter with a snowplow blade attached to the front. The elastic base of the cover holds it in place even in strong winds. It proved durable and easy to put on and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Fit my four wheeler perfect. Easy to get on and off and keep the 4 wheeler out of the elements.
customer_reviews.author: ashley tucker

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Had this cover for a year or so now and it’s still doing its job
customer_reviews.author: Shawn sommers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This works great! The material It is made of is good quality. It is heavy duty and stays on perfect. Does exactly what it needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this cover he bought for our Honda 4 wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for our quads, and they are great. They are really large which makes them easy to get on and off. Good material, works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Sara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Well made sacrificial cover.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2001 Honda Recon. The cover sheds water well and has held up to some strong winds. Bottom strap is easy and needed for windy days.
customer_reviews.author: One of Many

product_meta.title: LotFancy All Weather Waterproof ATV Cover, Heavy Duty Black Quad Protects 4 Wheelers Outdoor Protection from Wind UV Sun Snow Rain (L 86x47x39 inches)
feature_bullets: Protection - Protects against every kind of weather and harmful UV rays, shelter your ATV from Rain, Wind, Sun, Snow, Dust,Storm etc
Durable - Made of 300 x 300D woven nylon, double stitched reinforced seams, durable oxford material protects your car for longer use; The 2 air vents with velcro closures will ensure moisture escape
Size - Comes in 3 sizes for you to choose from, depends on the kind of ATV you drive, if you don't know how do you choose the size, pls contact with us before purchasing
Universal Fit: The large atv cover is perfect for any types, Yamaha, Raptor, Suzuki, Polaris, Harley Davidson, etc

1-Year Warranty: Money-back satisfaction guarantee if you have any concerns about it, pls contact with us directly without any hassle, we will be pleasure to provide good customer service to you in a satisfied way
